text:
Oh, no, sorry, sorry.
Can't afford to be tired yet.

It seems like we might finally have a job with everyone
together after a while...! It's finally a job that feels like L'Antica.

Even if there's no activity as L'Antica,
everyone should be fine, right?

Everyone is recognized individually and
is doing well in their solo work, right?

Kogane, Mamimi, Yuika, Kiriko...
They shine even without L'Antica.
Surely, it doesn't have to be "here"...

At 283PRO, you don't necessarily
have to belong to a unit, right?

...If you don't mind,
could you tell me more slowly?

No, it's nothing much.
I just wanted to hear it casually.

Well, lately there hasn't been much time to relax,
and I'd like to have some of Sakuya's coffee after a long time.

Oh, that's nice to hear.
In that case, I'll gladly prepare it for you.
